articles.title: Space photo of the week: 'Earthrise,' the Christmas Eve image that changed the world - Livescience.com
articles.description: Snapped from lunar orbit in 1968 by NASA astronaut Bill Anders, who died this week at age 90, 'Earthrise' is perhaps the most iconic image of our planet ever taken.
